text: Eugenio Bonicco (30 August 1919 - 6 November 1987) was an Italian alpine skier. He competed in the men's downhill at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Italian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Piedmont
title: Eugenio Bonicco
